name: Christ on the Cross with the Virgin Mary, Mary Magdalene, and Saint John
description: Christ on the Cross with the Virgin Mary, Mary Magdalene, and Saint John; Pietro da Cortona (Italian, 1596 - 1669); Italy; about 1661; Pen and brown ink and gray wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, on light brown paper, squared in black chalk; the oval only reinforced in red chalk; 40.3 x 26.5 cm (15 7/8 x 10 7/16 in.); 92.GB.79; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Christ on the Cross with the Virgin Mary, Mary Magdalene, and Saint John
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, on light brown paper, squared in black chalk; the oval only reinforced in red chalk
